sentences.en: Although there are five candidates, realistically it is a two - horse race.
sentences.cn: 虽然有5名候选者, 实际上这是两名强者的对抗.

sentences.en: Besides, the planetary monsoon in the troposphere is also realistically reproduced.
sentences.cn: 此外, 模式也真实再现了对流层高层的行星季风.
他从实际出发解决问题.

sentences.en: He realistically admitted his chance of victory to be fifty - fifty.
sentences.cn: 他承认实际上获胜的机会是一半一半.

sentences.en: Once you receive an offer, evaluate it realistically.
sentences.cn: 在得到某份工作后, 要对它做出现实的评价.

sentences.en: Realistically control an airplane using the motion sensor.
sentences.cn: 切实控制飞机使用运动传感器.

sentences.en: Realistically speaking, at that time my parents were really comforting me.
sentences.cn: 说实在的, 我父母在那时一直安慰我.

sentences.en: Realistically, we see this all the time in other industries.
sentences.cn: 实际上, 我们总是可以在其他的工业界也看到这样的例子.

sentences.en: Realistically, we’re not going to get this finished this week.
sentences.cn: 说实在的，这个星期我们完成不了这事。

sentences.en: That, I think, will help elevate his game more realistically and practically.
sentences.cn: 就是这样, 我想, 才是实际上和事实上能帮助他提高比赛效率的方法.

sentences.en: The artist tried to depict realistically the Battle of Waterloo.
sentences.cn: 这位画家试图逼真地刻画滑铁卢战役.

sentences.en: The film starts off realistically and then develops into a ridiculous fantasy.
sentences.cn: 电影以写实开头，然后却发展成为荒诞的幻想。

sentences.en: The only one we can realistically check is the last.
sentences.cn: 但我们实际上可以核实的信息只有最后那个邮箱地址.

sentences.en: While they are peeing, the two figures move realistically.
sentences.cn: 当他们尿的过程中, 这两个雕塑看起来非常逼真.

sentences.en: You an elite attorney very realistically . Was that ever your childhood dream?
sentences.cn: 问题﹕你全饰检查官的角色很真实 ﹐ 那是你小时候的梦想 吗 ?

sentences.en: You can’t realistically expect to win the whole competition.
sentences.cn: 你指望场场比赛都赢是不现实的。

words.tran_cn: 现实的；现实主义的；逼真的；实在论的
现实主义；实在论；现实主义的态度和行为

trans.tran_en: if you think about something realistically, you think about it in a practical way and according to what is actually possible
